not.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM user_tab_columns utc LEFT OUTER JOIN user_cons_columns ucc ON ( utc.table_name = ucc.table_name AND utc.column_name = ucc.column_name) LEFT OUTER JOIN user_constraints uc ON (ucc.constraint_name = uc.constraint_name) WHERE utc.table_name = 'CS_RULE' AND ( uc.constraint_type = 'C' OR uc.constraint_type IS NULL) AND utc.column_name = 'QUERY' AND uc.search_condition is not null;

changeSet.sql: update cs_synonym a set a.syn_list_id = (select b.syn_list_id from cs_syn_list_mapping b where a.syn_id = b.syn_id and rownum=1)

column.value: A base search asset form handler. Fills in control/review columns for new/updated assets.

column.value: Synonym mappings form handler. Performs required specific validation on updated fields.
